notes: Function calls (weather and math) in non-streaming mode
requestBody: {"max_output_tokens":200,"stream":false,"input":[{"role":"system","content":[{"type":"input_text","text":"You are a helpful assistant with access to weather data and calculation capabilities."}]},{"role":"user","content":[{"text":"What's the weather in Tokyo? Also calculate 15 * 23.","type":"input_text"}]}],"tools":[{"parameters":{"required":["location"],"type":"object","properties":{"location":{"type":"string","description":"The city and country, e.g. 'Tokyo, Japan'"}}},"description":"Get current weather for a location","type":"function","name":"get_weather"},{"parameters":{"required":["expression"],"type":"object","properties":{"expression":{"description":"Mathematical expression to evaluate","type":"string"}}},"description":"Perform mathematical calculations","type":"function","name":"calculate_math"}],"model":"gpt-5-nano"}
